name: Bramblehame
description:
Bramblehame is a damp little sphere somewhere among the many such baubles dangled from the humpbacked sky. Bramblehame is a grieving world. The Sun is lost behind thick grey clouds  and the rains never stop. There was perhaps once a Moon. Stars fall between raindrops, bringing exciting new magics. 

The book contains 7 Wanderhome inspired animal-folk backgrounds for Troika, as well as its own simple system!

This zine was created in response to some terrible flooding which left us displaced for a month. It draws heavily on Irish and Scottish mythology and wildlife. 

All of the art was lovingly created by Axe Marnie!

Bramblehame is an independent production of Two Rats Press and is not affiliated with Melsonian Arts Council, or Possum Creek Games, or Troika, or Wanderhome.
